2. Councilmember Todd Eidson

Councilmember Todd Eidson
=========================

Todd Eidson has lived in Fredericksburg for over 12 years and is the owner of Sierra Homes, a local custom homebuilding company.

Prior to his election to the Council, he was a member of the City’s Historic Review Board since July 2024.

Eidson has also contributed to several City initiatives, including the Comprehensive Plan Advisory Committee, the Historic District Guidelines Steering Committee, and the Workforce Housing Advisory Board. He served on the Chamber of Commerce Board for six years, including one year as Chair, and was named the Chamber’s 2024 Man of the Year.

Professionally, Eidson is active in regional and state builder associations and helped launch the Casa Über Alles building trades program at Fredericksburg High School. He also serves on several nonprofit advisory committees, including the Hill Country SPCA, and the Friends of the Fredericksburg Nature Center. He was a founding board member of The Grace Center.

He has served on the City Council from 2025-present.
